00069 
00073 static const int WORLD_W = 120;
00074 
00078 static const int WORLD_H = 100;
00079 
00080 
00082 // Template class definitions
00083 
00084 
00094 template <typename DATA, int BLKSIZE>
00095 class Map
00096 {
00097 public:
00098     Map(DATA defaultValue);
00099     Map(const Map<DATA, BLKSIZE>& map);
00100     Map& operator=(const Map<DATA, BLKSIZE> &map);
00101     ~Map();
00102 
00104     const int MAP_BLOCKSIZE;
00105     const int MAP_W; 
00106     const int MAP_H; 
00107 
00108     void fill(DATA val);
00109     void clear();
00110 
00111     inline void set(int x, int y, DATA val);
00112     inline DATA get(int x, int y) const;
00113     inline bool onMap(int x, int y) const;
00114 
00115     inline void worldSet(int x, int y, DATA val);
00116     inline DATA worldGet(int x, int y) const;
00117     inline bool worldOnMap(int x, int y) const;
00118 
00119     DATA *getBase();
00120 
00121 private:
00123     DATA _mapData[((WORLD_W + BLKSIZE - 1) / BLKSIZE)
00124                  * ((WORLD_H + BLKSIZE -1) / BLKSIZE)];
00125 
00126     const DATA _MAP_DEFAULT_VALUE; 
00127 };
00128 
00129 
00135 template <typename DATA, int BLKSIZE>
00136 Map<DATA, BLKSIZE>::Map(DATA defaultValue):
00137             MAP_BLOCKSIZE(BLKSIZE),
00138             MAP_W((WORLD_W + BLKSIZE - 1) / BLKSIZE),
00139             MAP_H((WORLD_H + BLKSIZE - 1) / BLKSIZE),
00140             _MAP_DEFAULT_VALUE(defaultValue)
00141 {
00142 }
00143 
00144 
00146 template <typename DATA, int BLKSIZE>
00147 Map<DATA, BLKSIZE>::Map(const Map<DATA, BLKSIZE> &map):
00148             MAP_BLOCKSIZE(BLKSIZE),
00149             MAP_W((WORLD_W + BLKSIZE - 1) / BLKSIZE),
00150             MAP_H((WORLD_H + BLKSIZE - 1) / BLKSIZE),
00151             _MAP_DEFAULT_VALUE(map._MAP_DEFAULT_VALUE)
00152 {
00153     for (int i = 0; i < this->MAP_W * this->MAP_H; i++) {
00154         this->_mapData[i] = map._mapData[i];
00155     }
00156 }
00157 
00158 
00160 template <typename DATA, int BLKSIZE>
00161 Map<DATA, BLKSIZE> &Map<DATA, BLKSIZE>::operator=(const Map<DATA, BLKSIZE> &map)
00162 {
00163     if(this != &map) {
00164         for (int i = 0; i < this->MAP_W * this->MAP_H; i++) {
00165             this->_mapData[i] = map._mapData[i];
00166         }
00167     }
00168     return *this;
00169 }
00170 
00171 
00173 template <typename DATA, int BLKSIZE>
00174 Map<DATA, BLKSIZE>::~Map()
00175 {
00176 }
00177 
00178 
00184 template <typename DATA, int BLKSIZE>
00185 void Map<DATA, BLKSIZE>::fill(DATA value)
00186 {
00187     for (int i = 0; i < this->MAP_W * this->MAP_H; i++) {
00188         this->_mapData[i] = value;
00189     }
00190 }
00191 
00192 
00198 template <typename DATA, int BLKSIZE>
00199 void Map<DATA, BLKSIZE>::clear()
00200 {
00201     fill(this->_MAP_DEFAULT_VALUE);
00202 }
00203 
00204 
00209 template <typename DATA, int BLKSIZE>
00210 DATA *Map<DATA, BLKSIZE>::getBase()
00211 {
00212     return this->_mapData;
00213 }
00214 
00215 
00224 template <typename DATA, int BLKSIZE>
00225 inline void Map<DATA, BLKSIZE>::set(int x, int y, DATA value)
00226 {
00227     if(this->onMap(x, y)) {
00228         this->_mapData[x * MAP_H + y] = value;
00229     }
00230 }
00231 
00232 
00241 template <typename DATA, int BLKSIZE>
00242 inline DATA Map<DATA, BLKSIZE>::get(int x, int y) const
00243 {
00244     if(!this->onMap(x, y)) {
00245         return this->_MAP_DEFAULT_VALUE;
00246     }
00247 
00248     return this->_mapData[x * MAP_H + y];
00249 }
00250 
00251 
00258 template <typename DATA, int BLKSIZE>
00259 inline bool Map<DATA, BLKSIZE>::onMap(int x, int y) const
00260 {
00261     return (x >= 0 && x < this->MAP_W) && (y >= 0 && y < this->MAP_H);
00262 }
00263 
00264 
00273 template <typename DATA, int BLKSIZE>
00274 inline void Map<DATA, BLKSIZE>::worldSet(int x, int y, DATA value)
00275 {
00276     if(this->worldOnMap(x, y)) {
00277         x /= BLKSIZE;
00278         y /= BLKSIZE;
00279         this->_mapData[x * MAP_H + y] = value;
00280     }
00281 }
00282 
00283 
00292 template <typename DATA, int BLKSIZE>
00293 inline DATA Map<DATA, BLKSIZE>::worldGet(int x, int y) const
00294 {
00295     if(!this->worldOnMap(x, y)) {
00296         return this->_MAP_DEFAULT_VALUE;
00297     }
00298 
00299     x /= BLKSIZE;
00300     y /= BLKSIZE;
00301     return this->_mapData[x * MAP_H + y];
00302 }
00303 
00304 
00311 template <typename DATA, int BLKSIZE>
00312 inline bool Map<DATA, BLKSIZE>::worldOnMap(int x, int y) const
00313 {
00314     return (x >= 0 && x < WORLD_W) && (y >= 0 && y < WORLD_H);
00315 }

00321 
00322 typedef Map<Byte, 1> MapByte1; 
00323 typedef Map<Byte, 2> MapByte2; 
00324 typedef Map<Byte, 4> MapByte4; 
00325 typedef Map<short, 8> MapShort8;
